00033 //: Define default values
00034 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::set_defaults()
00035 {
00036   step_size_=1.0;
00037   ni_=7; nj_=7;
00038   ref_x_=0.5*(ni_-1);
00039   ref_y_=0.5*(nj_-1);
00040   search_ni_=5;
00041   search_nj_=5;
00042   nA_=0;
00043   dA_=0.0;
00044   overlap_f_=1.0;
00045 }

00061 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::set_kernel_size(unsigned ni, unsigned nj,
00062                                                double ref_x, double ref_y)
00063 {
00064   ni_=ni; nj_=nj;
00065   ref_x_=ref_x;
00066   ref_y_=ref_y;

00068 
00069 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::set_kernel_size(unsigned ni, unsigned nj)
00070 {
00071   ni_=ni; nj_=nj;
00072   ref_x_=0.5*(ni_-1);
00073   ref_y_=0.5*(nj_-1);
00074 }
00075 
00076 //: Define region size in world co-ordinates
00077 //  Sets up ROI to cover given box (with samples at step_size()),
00078 //  with ref point at centre.
00079 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::set_region_size(double wi, double wj)
00080 {
00081   wi/=step_size();
00082   wj/=step_size();
00083   int ni = vcl_max(1,int(0.99+wi));
00084   int nj = vcl_max(1,int(0.99+wj));
00085   set_kernel_size(unsigned(ni),unsigned(nj));
00086 }
00087 
00088 //: Number of dimensions in the model
00089 unsigned mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::model_dim()
00090 {
00091   return 2*ni_*nj_;
00092 }

00095 //: Initialise building
00096 // Must be called before any calls to add_example(...)
00097 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::clear(unsigned n_egs)
00098 {
00099   n_added_=0;
00100 }
00101 
00102 static void normalize(vil_image_view<double>& im)
00103 {
00104   unsigned ni=im.ni(),nj=im.nj();
00105   double sum=0.0,ss=0.0;
00106   for (unsigned j=0;j<nj;++j)
00107     for (unsigned i=0;i<ni;++i)
00108     {
00109       sum+=im(i,j); ss+=im(i,j)*im(i,j);
00110     }
00111 
00112   assert(!vnl_math_isnan(sum));
00113 
00114   if (ss<1e-6)
00115   {
00116     vcl_cerr<<"Warning: Almost flat region in mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder\n"
00117             <<"         Size: "<<ni<<" x "<<nj<<vcl_endl;
00118   }
00119 
00120   // Normalise so that im has zero mean and unit sum of squares.
00121   double mean=sum/(ni*nj);
00122   ss-=(mean*mean*ni*nj);
00123   double s=1.0;
00124   if (ss>0) s = vcl_sqrt(1.0/ss);
00125   vil_math_scale_and_offset_values(im,s,-s*mean);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::diff_image(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00129                                           const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00130                                           const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u,
00131                                           vil_image_view<double>& grad_x,
00132                                           vil_image_view<double>& grad_y)
00133 {
00134   assert(image.image().size()>0);
00135 
00136   vgl_vector_2d<double> u1=step_size_*u;
00137   vgl_vector_2d<double> v1(-u1.y(),u1.x());
00138 
00139   const vimt_transform_2d& s_w2i = image.world2im();
00140   vgl_point_2d<double> p0, im_p0;
00141   vgl_vector_2d<double> im_u, im_v;
00142 
00143   vil_image_view<float> sample;
00144 
00145   // get raw image data first
00146   p0 = p-(ref_x_+0.5)*u1-ref_y_*v1;
00147   im_p0 = s_w2i(p0);
00148   im_u = s_w2i.delta(p0, u1);
00149   im_v = s_w2i.delta(p0, v1);
00150   vil_resample_bilin(image.image(),sample, im_p0.x(),im_p0.y(),
00151                      im_u.x(),im_u.y(), im_v.x(),im_v.y(), ni_+1,nj_);
00152 
00153   // take differences across x
00154   grad_x.set_size(ni_,nj_);
00155 
00156   const float* s1 = sample.top_left_ptr();
00157   const float* s2 = sample.top_left_ptr()+sample.istep();
00158   vcl_ptrdiff_t s_jstep = sample.jstep();
00159 
00160   double* kx = grad_x.top_left_ptr();
00161   vcl_ptrdiff_t kx_jstep = grad_x.jstep();
00162 
00163   for (unsigned j=0;j<nj_;++j,kx+=kx_jstep,s1+=s_jstep,s2+=s_jstep)
00164     for (unsigned i=0;i<ni_;++i)
00165       *(kx+i) = *(s2+i) - *(s1+i);
00166 
00167 
00168   // get raw image data first
00169   p0 = p-ref_x_*u1-(ref_y_+0.5)*v1;
00170   im_p0 = s_w2i(p0);
00171   im_u = s_w2i.delta(p0, u1);
00172   im_v = s_w2i.delta(p0, v1);
00173   vil_resample_bilin(image.image(),sample, im_p0.x(),im_p0.y(),
00174                      im_u.x(),im_u.y(), im_v.x(),im_v.y(), ni_,nj_+1);
00175 
00176   // take differences across y
00177   grad_y.set_size(ni_,nj_);
00178 
00179   s1 = sample.top_left_ptr();
00180   s2 = sample.top_left_ptr()+sample.jstep();
00181   s_jstep = sample.jstep();
00182 
00183   double* ky = grad_y.top_left_ptr();
00184   vcl_ptrdiff_t ky_jstep = grad_y.jstep();
00185 
00186   for (unsigned j=0;j<nj_;++j,ky+=ky_jstep,s1+=s_jstep,s2+=s_jstep)
00187     for (unsigned i=0;i<ni_;++i)
00188       *(ky+i) = *(s2+i) - *(s1+i);
00189 }
00190 
00191 //: Add one example to the model
00192 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::add_one_example(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00193                                                const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00194                                                const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u)
00195 {
00196   assert(image.image().size()>0);
00197 
00198   vil_image_view<double> grad_x, grad_y;
00199   diff_image(image,p,u,grad_x,grad_y);
00200   normalize(grad_x);
00201   normalize(grad_y);
00202 
00203   if (n_added_==0)
00204   {
00205     sum_x_.deep_copy(grad_x);
00206     sum_y_.deep_copy(grad_y);
00207   }
00208   else
00209   {
00210     vil_math_add_image_fraction(sum_x_,1.0,grad_x,1.0);
00211     vil_math_add_image_fraction(sum_y_,1.0,grad_y,1.0);
00212   }
00213   n_added_++;
00214 }
00215 
00216 //: Get sample of region around specified point in image
00217 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::get_sample_vector(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00218                                                  const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00219                                                  const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u,
00220                                                  vcl_vector<double>& v)
00221 {
00222   assert(image.image().size()>0);
00223 
00224   vil_image_view<double> grad_x, grad_y;
00225   diff_image(image,p,u,grad_x,grad_y);
00226 
00227   v.resize( model_dim() );
00228   unsigned v_ind=0;
00229 
00230   for (unsigned j=0;j<grad_x.nj();j++)
00231     for (unsigned i=0;i<grad_x.ni();i++,v_ind++)
00232       v[v_ind] = grad_x(i,j);
00233 
00234   for (unsigned j=0;j<grad_y.nj();j++)
00235     for (unsigned i=0;i<grad_y.ni();i++,v_ind++)
00236       v[v_ind] = grad_y(i,j);
00237 }
00238 
00239 //: Add one example to the model
00240 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::add_example(const vimt_image_2d_of<float>& image,
00241                                            const vgl_point_2d<double>& p,
00242                                            const vgl_vector_2d<double>& u)
00243 {
00244   if (nA_==0)
00245   {
00246     add_one_example(image,p,u);
00247     return;
00248   }
00249 
00250   vgl_vector_2d<double> v(-u.y(),u.x());
00251   for (int iA=-int(nA_);iA<=(int)nA_;++iA)
00252   {
00253     double A = iA*dA_;
00254     vgl_vector_2d<double> uA = u*vcl_cos(A)+v*vcl_sin(A);
00255     add_one_example(image,p,uA);
00256   }
00257 }
00258 
00259 //: Build this object from the data supplied in add_example()
00260 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::build(mfpf_point_finder& pf)
00261 {
00262   assert(n_added_>0);
00263   assert(pf.is_a()=="mfpf_grad_corr2d");
00264   mfpf_grad_corr2d& nc = static_cast<mfpf_grad_corr2d&>(pf);
00265 
00266   vil_image_view<double> mean_x;
00267   mean_x.deep_copy(sum_x_);
00268   vil_math_scale_values(mean_x,1.0/n_added_);
00269   normalize(mean_x);
00270 
00271   vil_image_view<double> mean_y;
00272   mean_y.deep_copy(sum_y_);
00273   vil_math_scale_values(mean_y,1.0/n_added_);
00274   normalize(mean_y);
00275 
00276   nc.set(mean_x,mean_y,ref_x_,ref_y_);
00277   set_base_parameters(nc);
00278   nc.set_overlap_f(overlap_f_);
00279 }
00280 
00281 //=======================================================================
00282 // Method: set_from_stream
00283 //=======================================================================
00284 //: Initialise from a string stream
00285 bool mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::set_from_stream(vcl_istream &is)
00286 {
00287   // Cycle through string and produce a map of properties
00288   vcl_string s = mbl_parse_block(is);
00289   vcl_istringstream ss(s);
00290   mbl_read_props_type props = mbl_read_props_ws(ss);
00291 
00292   set_defaults();
00293 
00294   // Extract the properties
00295   parse_base_props(props);
00296 
00297   if (props.find("ni")!=props.end())
00298   {
00299     ni_=vul_string_atoi(props["ni"]);
00300     props.erase("ni");
00301   }
00302   if (props.find("nj")!=props.end())
00303   {
00304     nj_=vul_string_atoi(props["nj"]);
00305     props.erase("nj");
00306   }
00307 
00308   overlap_f_=vul_string_atof(props.get_optional_property("overlap_f", "1.0"));
00309 
00310   if (props.find("ref_x")!=props.end())
00311   {
00312     ref_x_=vul_string_atof(props["ref_x"]);
00313     props.erase("ref_x");
00314   }
00315   else ref_x_=0.5*(ni_-1.0);
00316 
00317   if (props.find("ref_y")!=props.end())
00318   {
00319     ref_y_=vul_string_atof(props["ref_y"]);
00320     props.erase("ref_y");
00321   }
00322   else ref_y_=0.5*(nj_-1.0);
00323 
00324   if (props.find("nA")!=props.end())
00325   {
00326     nA_=vul_string_atoi(props["nA"]);
00327     props.erase("nA");
00328   }
00329 
00330   if (props.find("dA")!=props.end())
00331   {
00332     dA_=vul_string_atof(props["dA"]);
00333     props.erase("dA");
00334   }
00335 
00336   // Check for unused props
00337   mbl_read_props_look_for_unused_props(
00338       "mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::set_from_stream", props, mbl_read_props_type());
00339   return true;
00340 }

00361 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::print_summary(vcl_ostream& os) const
00362 {
00363   os << "{ size: " << ni_ << 'x' << nj_
00364      << " nA: " << nA_ << " dA: " << dA_ <<' ';
00365   mfpf_point_finder_builder::print_summary(os);
00366   os <<" overlap_f: "<<overlap_f_
00367      << " }";
00368 }

00370 //: Version number for I/O
00371 short mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::version_no() const
00372 {
00373   return 2;
00374 }
00375 
00376 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::b_write(vsl_b_ostream& bfs) const
00377 {
00378   vsl_b_write(bfs,version_no());
00379   mfpf_point_finder_builder::b_write(bfs);  // Save base class
00380   vsl_b_write(bfs,ni_);
00381   vsl_b_write(bfs,nj_);
00382   vsl_b_write(bfs,ref_x_);
00383   vsl_b_write(bfs,ref_y_);
00384   vsl_b_write(bfs,nA_);
00385   vsl_b_write(bfs,dA_);
00386   vsl_b_write(bfs,sum_x_);
00387   vsl_b_write(bfs,sum_y_);
00388   vsl_b_write(bfs,n_added_);
00389   vsl_b_write(bfs,overlap_f_);
00390 }
00391 
00392 //=======================================================================
00393 // Method: load
00394 //=======================================================================
00395 
00396 void mfpf_grad_corr2d_builder::b_read(vsl_b_istream& bfs)
00397 {
00398   if (!bfs) return;
00399   short version;
00400   vsl_b_read(bfs,version);
00401   switch (version)
00402   {
00403     case (1):
00404     case (2):
00405       mfpf_point_finder_builder::b_read(bfs);  // Load base class
00406       vsl_b_read(bfs,ni_);
00407       vsl_b_read(bfs,nj_);
00408       vsl_b_read(bfs,ref_x_);
00409       vsl_b_read(bfs,ref_y_);
00410       vsl_b_read(bfs,nA_);
00411       vsl_b_read(bfs,dA_);
00412       vsl_b_read(bfs,sum_x_);
00413       vsl_b_read(bfs,sum_y_);
00414       vsl_b_read(bfs,n_added_);
00415       if (version==1) overlap_f_=1.0;
00416       else            vsl_b_read(bfs,overlap_f_);
00417       break;
00418     default:
00419       vcl_cerr << "I/O ERROR: vsl_b_read(vsl_b_istream&)\n"
00420                << "           Unknown version number "<< version << vcl_endl;
00421       bfs.is().clear(vcl_ios::badbit); // Set an unrecoverable IO error on stream
00422       return;
00423   }
00424 }
